channel.title: Fletching xp PI
channel.description: im trying to fix my skills, I have my fletching worked out but when i fletch the items i fletch it dosnt give me xp, i can only fletch arrow shafts atm and they dont give xp. Its really basic i know but where exactly Would i add the xp and how Because theres so many options with fletching.
